description: This file provides helper functions to create SVG path data for line charts, area charts, and pie/donut charts, with considerations for accessibility and customizable parameters.

methods.name: buildLinePath(points, width, height, padding = 10)
methods.description: Generates the 'd' attribute for an SVG path representing a line chart based on input points, dimensions, and padding.

methods.name: buildAreaPath(points, width, height, padding = 10)
methods.description: Creates the 'd' attribute for an SVG area under a line, filling to the bottom baseline.

methods.name: buildPieArcs(data, cx, cy, radius, innerRadius = 0)
methods.description: Converts data points into SVG arc paths for pie or donut charts, calculating angles, arc flags, and paths.
